mapper.update: update sf_turn_table_rule set turn_table_id = #{turnTableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, times = #{times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, turn_table_id, times, status, type, remark, create_time, modify_time, modify_man from sf_turn_table_rule where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
